title: LF Clash Team Member
body:
Yo,
Myself and a couple of friends are looking for a 5th and final member for our clash team. The only prerequisite is that you're mature, have a strong team commitment, and can handle some banter. If you want to carry a few scrubs from either the Top Lane or the Jungle hit one of the following up:
Our Flex Top/Jungle- [Phatmattie](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Phatmattie)
Our Midlaner- [Frogglun](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Frogglun)
Our ADC- [WhoYouSellingFor](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=WhoYouSellingFor)
Or Myself, the Support- [Burnout](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Burnout)
